snippet: The Rev. Al Sharpton’s warning appeared to be aimed at Representative Charles B. Rangel, who repeatedly discussed race in a debate for the upcoming Democratic primary for Congress.
abstract: Rev Al Sharpton sends out stern warning against race-baiting in contest for 13th Congressional District in New York; message appears to be aimed at Rep Charles B Rangel of Harlem who repeatedly discussed race in a debate for the upcoming Democratic primary for Congress.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Al Sharpton’s warning appeared to be aimed at Representative Charles B. Rangel, who repeatedly discussed race in a debate for the upcoming Democratic primary for Congress.

headline.main: Sharpton Warns Against Race-Baiting in New York Contest
headline.print_headline: Sharpton Warns Against Race-Baiting in New York Contest
